title: Global Carbon Credit Trading Platform Market Analysis Report 2022 - Strategies Driving Net-Zero Goals to Boost ... - GlobeNewswire
summary: The global carbon credit trading platform market is expected to reach USD 200.6 billion by 2027 with a focus on curbing global warming through carbon markets and carbon capture solutions, led by companies investing in trading carbon credits.
